Prior to joining Plastic Logic in 2008, Peter worked as Director of Qimonda AG and Director of Infineon AG. He has more than 15 yearsâ€™ experience working in the semiconductor industry, holding senior positions in both R&D and manufacturing, with responsibility for large, multi-site, international teams.

He serves on the Board of Directors of the Organic and Printed Electronics Association (OE-A).

Peter holds a diploma and PhD in semiconductor physics from University of Magdeburg, Germany, with concurrent studies in laser physics. He has also studied in Japan at ISIR (Osaka University) and NTT Basic Research Labs in Tokyo.
